scenes.text:
Welcome to the Cardiff University Law Society! Regardless of your degree, all are welcome to become a member!

We aim to provide members with all-rounded experience, including social and educational experience.The Society strives to guarantee opportunities for members to establish network as part of the university experience and to build a career in law. 

The Society values diversity and inclusion as reflected by our D&I events, and are also committed to giving back to the community by working with charities.
We don't have a specific day, but specific date and times for socials we run can be found on our SU page and our social media.
Our membership is Â£13.50 for the year!
The Society regularly host social events as well as exclusive networking events with leading employers in the legal field, as well as workshops such as CV writing and interview skills.
